mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM name
WHERE dataset_key = #{datasetKey}
SELECT FROM WHERE n.published_in_key = #{refKey} ORDER BY key
SELECT FROM name ns JOIN name n ON n.homotypic_name_key=ns.homotypic_name_key WHERE ns.key=#{key}
